bibl.title: Palestine in Late Antiquity.
bibl.note: See in part. pp. 77-93: Peripheral visions: The Negev [with references to the Nessana papyri, pp. 85-88].
bibl.seg: Hagith Sivan, Palestine in Late Antiquity.
Oxford - New York, Oxford University Press, 2008, 8°, xx-429 pp., 4 cartes. ISBN 978-0-19-928417-7. £65.
See in part. pp. 77-93: Peripheral visions: The Negev [with references to the Nessana papyri, pp. 85-88].

C.R. par David Hunt, Journal of Late Antiquity 3 (2010) pp. 391-393. - Rainer Kampling, ThRev 106 (2010) pp. 273-274. - Dirk Kossmann, Klio 91 (2009) pp. 248-249. - Arnaldo Marcone, EtCl 77 (2009) pp. 386-387. - Fergus Millar, CR N.S., 59 (2009) pp. 230-231. - Jan Retsö, Journal of the Royal Asiatic Society 3rd ser., 19 (2009) pp. 244-247. - Günter Stemberger, HZ 289 (2009) pp. 432-434. - Sacha Stern, JEH 61 (2010) pp. 163-164. - Lucio Troiani, Athenaeum 100 (2012) pp. 742-746.
